data.title: Hero Wanted
data.meta_description: One sided widescreen dvd. Our dvd's are checked and polished to remove scratches before they are put up for sale. This does not mean they are 100% scratch free
data.text: One sided widescreen dvd. Our dvd's are checked and polished to remove scratches before they are put up for sale. This does not mean they are 100% scratch free but that they do play. Art sleeve is damaged where sticker was removed. Further condition details and JPG image available on request. ; Once the toast of the city, Liam Case (Cuba Gooding Jr. ) is now a forgotten man, a hero who's fame has passed him by. Hoping to restore his former glory, he attempts to foil an armed robbery, but winds up shot instead. Recovering from his wounds, Liam swears vengeance and begins a hunt of his own, leading to a shocking climax that proves the old adage: Heros are made, not born. ; DVD; 12mo 7" - 7Â½" tall
